titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to change the eligibility requirements for appointment as Secretary of Defense.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to change the eligibility requirements for appointment as Secretary of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Amends federal armed forces provisions to prohibit a person from being appointed as Secretary of Defense within three (currently, ten) years after active-duty service as a commissioned officer in a regular component of the Armed Forces.
